comments:
I ran the FileViewer example on my Macintosh, clicked around for a while, then
exited. I do not believe it was still filling in the list of items in the
current folder when I quit, but it might have been. The following walkback was
displayed in the console:

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Device is disposed
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:2316)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:2246)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.error(Display.java:474)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.wake(Display.java:1641)
	at org.eclipse.swt.examples.fileviewer.FileViewer$1.run(FileViewer.java:1502)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:554)
